Interactive Maps

Emissions and Temperature Maps

Temperature

Interactive visualization of land surface temperature across Saudi Arabia (2018–2021).

tem18 <- raster("/Users/raghadaltassan/Desktop/senior project/data/tem18.tif")
tem19 <- raster("/Users/raghadaltassan/Desktop/senior project/data/tem19.tif")
tem20 <- raster("/Users/raghadaltassan/Desktop/senior project/data/tem20.tif")
tem21 <- raster("/Users/raghadaltassan/Desktop/senior project/data/tem21.tif")

all_temp_vals <- c(values(tem18), values(tem19), values(tem20), values(tem21))
pal_temp <- colorNumeric(palette = "RdYlBu", domain = all_temp_vals, reverse = TRUE)

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addRasterImage(tem18, colors = pal_temp, opacity = 0.7, group = "2018") %>%
  addRasterImage(tem19, colors = pal_temp, opacity = 0.7, group = "2019") %>%
  addRasterImage(tem20, colors = pal_temp, opacity = 0.7, group = "2020") %>%
  addRasterImage(tem21, colors = pal_temp, opacity = 0.7, group = "2021") %>%
  addLegend(pal = pal_temp, values = all_temp_vals, title = "Temperature (°C)") %>%
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("2018", "2019", "2020", "2021"),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE)
  )

CO₂

Interactive map showing carbon dioxide concentrations (ppm) in Saudi Arabia between 2018 and 2021.

co2_2018 <- raster("/Users/raghadaltassan/Desktop/senior project/data/co218.tif")
co2_2019 <- raster("/Users/raghadaltassan/Desktop/senior project/data/co219.tif")
co2_2020 <- raster("/Users/raghadaltassan/Desktop/senior project/data/co220.tif")
co2_2021 <- raster("/Users/raghadaltassan/Desktop/senior project/data/co221.tif")

all_co2_vals <- c(values(co2_2018), values(co2_2019), values(co2_2020), values(co2_2021))
pal_co2 <- colorNumeric(palette = "YlOrRd", domain = all_co2_vals)

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addRasterImage(co2_2018, colors = pal_co2, opacity = 0.7, group = "2018") %>%
  addRasterImage(co2_2019, colors = pal_co2, opacity = 0.7, group = "2019") %>%
  addRasterImage(co2_2020, colors = pal_co2, opacity = 0.7, group = "2020") %>%
  addRasterImage(co2_2021, colors = pal_co2, opacity = 0.7, group = "2021") %>%
  addLegend(pal = pal_co2, values = all_co2_vals, title = "CO₂ (ppm)") %>%
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("2018", "2019", "2020", "2021"),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE)
  )

CH₄

Interactive map showing methane concentrations (ppb) across Saudi Arabia.

ch4_2018 <- raster("/Users/raghadaltassan/Desktop/senior project/data/ch418.tif")
ch4_2019 <- raster("/Users/raghadaltassan/Desktop/senior project/data/ch419.tif")
ch4_2020 <- raster("/Users/raghadaltassan/Desktop/senior project/data/ch420.tif")
ch4_2021 <- raster("/Users/raghadaltassan/Desktop/senior project/data/ch421.tif")

all_ch4_vals <- c(values(ch4_2018), values(ch4_2019), values(ch4_2020), values(ch4_2021))
pal_ch4 <- colorNumeric(palette = "BuPu", domain = all_ch4_vals)

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addRasterImage(ch4_2018, colors = pal_ch4, opacity = 0.7, group = "2018") %>%
  addRasterImage(ch4_2019, colors = pal_ch4, opacity = 0.7, group = "2019") %>%
  addRasterImage(ch4_2020, colors = pal_ch4, opacity = 0.7, group = "2020") %>%
  addRasterImage(ch4_2021, colors = pal_ch4, opacity = 0.7, group = "2021") %>%
  addLegend(pal = pal_ch4, values = all_ch4_vals, title = "CH₄ (ppb)") %>%
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("2018", "2019", "2020", "2021"),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE)
  )
